text: India is [music] about to make a big move in artificial intelligence. For the first time ever, India is [music] launching a dedicated AI university. Guess where Andhra Pradesh will establish it in Amirawati, partnering with Nvidia with operations set to begin on February 19, [music] 2026. This isn't just a campus. It's the foundation of an AI [music] ecosystem. Nvidia will design the curriculum and train 10,000 engineering students in 2 years. Research centers, infrastructure and innovation are all part of the plan. The scope goes beyond education. Andhra [music] Pradesh will support 500 AI startups with global mentorship and investor [music] access. With AI factories and a quantum tech valley, Amiraati is being [music] shaped as a knowledge capital. So without a doubt we can say [music] the future of AI in India is being built right now.
